status_message: Contributor details: Srinivas works with the social media agency, Social Wavelength as an online community manager & planner for various brands in India to feed his hungry stomach and passion for Social Media! Recently to fulfill his appetite, he's joined Social Samosa as an Evangelist. On other days he is a wandering thinker and a pondering writer who keeps travelling across the country in his free time to look for stories & experiences beyond oblivion, hoping one day to publish a travel book of his own. Read his posts here - http://www.socialsamosa.com/author/srinistuff/

status_message: Case Study : Shari Academy runs weekend workshops promoted primarily though the Photography Tips fan page and the blog. It's a packed house with people turning up from other cities sometimes to attend these paid workshops. Since the beginning of our efforts we have nearly doubled and at times almost tripled the strength of each workshop.  http://www.socialsamosa.com/2011/12/tips-beyond-photography-case-study-of-shari-academy-of-photography/

status_message: Contributor Details: Zenith Sahai has recently completed her Masters degree in Media and Communication from Brunel University, West London. The field of Social Media and the wonderful opportunities it holds intrigues her, and for that reason, her Masters' dissertation thesis was also based on the topic of Social Media, titled: Personal Branding through Social Media: A case study on Bollywood Celebrities. Prior to that, she has also worked as an Entertainment Journalist with Sanskriti Media and Entertainment, Mumbai. Follow her on Twitter at @Zen_Zie

A Bachelor of Mass Media Graduate (BMM) from Jai Hind College in Mumbai, he currently works as a manager (Creative) at one of the biggest digital agencies in India and his responsibilities there include conceptualizing promotional content and campaigns for several leading brands of the country. He is always online, especially at ungodly hours, so don't hesitate to give him some for food for thought... or just food would be great too!

status_message:
What kind of articles to expect:

Indian SM case studies
Interviews
News articles
Platform reviews
Best practices 
Training posts
Social media and personal use
Usage of social media by different industry
SM guidelines 
Consumer trends
Social media industry trends/forecast
Expert opinions 
Platform trends

While the Indian Social Media industry still struggles to shape itself up, we all have a lot to learn and grow. Social Samosa hopes to become a knowledge repository talking about social media scenario in India to shore up this growth. The portal aims to be the enabler of thoughts and practices to an individual, a brand or an organization.
We've been working on some stuff offline, and hopefully we are gonna be gonna be live soon! Watch this space for further updates..
